FUNCTION DELETE :
IString
Deletes a number of runes from a string
Returns 0 in case of
eErrorID
<>
ERROR.NO_ERROR
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Comment
Return
DELETE
IString
Input
itfString
IString
The original String, will not be modified
udiCount
UDINT
Length of the partial string to be deleted, number of runes
udiStart
UDINT
Position in
itfString
after which the deletion starts
Runes counted from left
Must be greater than 0 (See
RIGHT
, if the right part of a string is needed)
itfResource
IString
The resource that this function is working on. It will
contain the result after the function call and will also be
returned by this function so it can be used in nested calls.

ERROR
